creditline: Gift of Helen M. King in memory of Allen S. King
description: teapot decorated with 6 cartouches on body 4 containing high relief floral sprays and 2 with incised seals; handle separately attached with ivory rings at top and bottom; hinged lid with organic finial
markings: \'SEMPER IDEM [on a belt encircling a dragon holding a cross]\', in central cartouche on each side of body; \'664/21 15\', incised, on bottom; 5 stamps on bottom, including a woman\'s silhouette, a tiger\'s head, a lion, script letter \'U\' (?) and \'JÂ·A\'
title: Teapot, from a Tea and Coffee Service
